<title level="1" right="Rules">[Rune Formulas](/Rules.aspx?ID=735)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 580 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The Price of a rune’s formula is the same as the Price of a formula for an item of the same level; it can be acquired in the same way as an item formula (described on page 293).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
